name: part_002
file: tmp_【#ときのそら５周年記念】想いをこめて届ける3D配信！ [TjGC7Jzc5ns]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs the song 'Uso' (Lies) on stage in her signature blue idol outfit.
Tokino Sora performs a cover of 'God knows...'. She starts in her blue idol outfit and transitions to a white 5th-anniversary dress mid-performance.

subtitles.original: 揺らした気持ちは言いたいほど
subtitles.english: The feelings I shook were almost too much to say

subtitles.original: だから僕らサヨナラ
subtitles.english: And so, we say goodbye

subtitles.original: いつかまたねと手を振りあったけど
subtitles.english: We waved and said "see you again sometime"

subtitles.original: もう会うことはないのでしょう
subtitles.english: But we likely won't ever meet again

subtitles.original: 最後の嘘は優しい嘘でした
subtitles.english: That final lie was a kind one

subtitles.original: 忘れないあの日見た空
subtitles.english: I won't forget the sky I saw that day

subtitles.original: 茜色の空を
subtitles.english: That madder-red sky

subtitles.original: ねぇいつか思い出すでしょう
subtitles.english: Hey, you'll remember it eventually, won't you?

subtitles.original: 果たせなかった約束を抱いて
subtitles.english: Embracing the promises we couldn't keep

subtitles.original: 二人歩き出す
subtitles.english: The two of us start walking

subtitles.original:
God knows...
作詞：畑 亜貴　作曲：神前 暁
subtitles.english:
God knows...
Lyrics: Aki Hata  Composition: Satoru Kosaki

subtitles.original: 乾いた心で駆け抜ける
subtitles.english: Running through with a parched heart

subtitles.original: ごめんね何もできなくて
subtitles.english: I'm sorry I couldn't do anything

subtitles.original: 痛みを分かち合うことさえ
subtitles.english: Even sharing the pain

subtitles.original: あなたは許してくれない
subtitles.english: Is something you won't allow

subtitles.original: 無垢に生きるため振り向かず
subtitles.english: In order to live purely, without looking back

subtitles.original: 背中向けて去ってしまう
subtitles.english: You turn your back and leave

subtitles.original: on the lonely rail
subtitles.english: on the lonely rail

subtitles.original: 私ついていくよ
subtitles.english: I will follow you

subtitles.original: どんな辛い世界の闇の中でさえ
subtitles.english: No matter how bitter the darkness of this world

subtitles.original: きっとあなたは輝いて
subtitles.english: I'm sure you'll be shining

subtitles.original: 超える未来の果て
subtitles.english: Beyond the end of the future

subtitles.original: 弱さゆえに魂壊されぬように
subtitles.english: So your soul won't be broken by weakness

subtitles.original: my way 重なるよ
subtitles.english: my way, they overlap

subtitles.original: 今二人等しく
subtitles.english: Now, the two of us equally

subtitles.original: 届けて熱くなる想いは
subtitles.english: Deliver these feelings that are growing hot

subtitles.original: 現実溶かして彷徨う
subtitles.english: They melt reality and wander

subtitles.original: 会いたい気持ちに理由はない
subtitles.english: There's no reason for wanting to see you

subtitles.original: あなたへ溢れだすラビリンス
subtitles.english: A labyrinth overflowing towards you

subtitles.original: せめて美しい夢だけを
subtitles.english: Let's at least chase only beautiful dreams

subtitles.original: 描きながら追いかけよう
subtitles.english: While painting them

subtitles.original: for your lonely heart
subtitles.english: for your lonely heart

subtitles.original: やめて嘘はあなたらしくないよ
subtitles.english: Stop it, lying isn't like you

subtitles.original: 目を見てこれからのことを話そう
subtitles.english: Look into my eyes and let's talk about the future

subtitles.original: 私覚悟してる
subtitles.english: I am prepared

subtitles.original: 暗い未来だって
subtitles.english: Even for a dark future

subtitles.original: 強くなって運命変えられるかもね
subtitles.english: If I get stronger, maybe I can change destiny

subtitles.original: my wish かなえたいのに
subtitles.english: Though I want to grant my wish

subtitles.original: すべては
subtitles.english: Everything is...

subtitles.original: God knows...
subtitles.english: God knows...

subtitles.original: あなたがいて私がいて
subtitles.english: With you here and me here

subtitles.original: 他の人は消えてしまった
subtitles.english: Everyone else has disappeared

subtitles.original: 淡い夢の美しさを描きながら
subtitles.english: While painting the beauty of a faint dream

subtitles.original: 傷跡なぞる
subtitles.english: Tracing the scars

subtitles.original: だから私ついていくよ
subtitles.english: So, I will follow you

subtitles.original: どんな辛い世界の闇の中でさえ
subtitles.english: No matter how bitter the darkness of this world

subtitles.original: きっとあなたは輝いて
subtitles.english: I'm sure you'll be shining

subtitles.original: 超える未来の果て
subtitles.english: Beyond the end of the future

subtitles.original: 弱さゆえに魂壊されぬように
subtitles.english: So your soul won't be broken by weakness

subtitles.original: my way 重なるよ
subtitles.english: my way, they overlap
